wordGroup: roman catholicism n. 天主教；罗马公教

sentences.en: She, too, was a convert to Roman Catholicism.
sentences.cn: 她也改信罗马天主教了。

sentences.en: Latria is one of three forms of worship in Roman Catholicism.
sentences.cn: 专对天主的礼拜是罗马天主教的三种礼拜形式之一。

sentences.en: So, would we now convert to Catholicism?
sentences.cn: 那么，我们现在应该变成天主教徒吗？
